com.swopteam07.tablr.UI

Class DrawableComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swopteam07.tablr.UI.Component
      • com.swopteam07.tablr.UI.DrawableComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Component>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Checkbox, Label

    public abstract class DrawableComponent
extends Component
    A Class representing a UI component that can be drawn on the screen and that has meaning on it's own.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • DrawableComponent

        public DrawableComponent(int x,
                         int y,
                         int height,
                         int width,
                         boolean visible,
                         Component parent)
        Create a new drawable component with the given dimensions and visibility state.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the top left corner of the component relative to the parent component if it exists or the window if it doesn't.
        y - The y coordinate of the top left corner of the component.relative to the parent component if it exists or the window if it doesn't.
        height - The height of the component.
        width - The width of the component.
        visible - The visibility state of the new component.
        parent - The component that contains this component or null if this component has no parent.
        Effect:
        The drawable component is initialized as a component with the given parameters.
            super(x, y, height, width, visible, parent)

      • DrawableComponent

        public DrawableComponent(int x,
                         int y,
                         int height,
                         int width,
                         Component parent)
        Create a new visible drawable component with the given dimensions.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the top left corner of the component relative to the parent component if it exists or the window if it doesn't.
        y - The y coordinate of the top left corner of the component.relative to the parent component if it exists or the window if it doesn't.
        height - The height of the component.
        width - The width of the component.
        parent - The component that contains this component or null if this component has no parent.
        Effect:
        The drawable component is initialized with the given parameters.
            this(x, y, height, width, true, parent)

      • DrawableComponent

        public DrawableComponent(Component parent)
        Create a new drawable component with a 0 surface area.
        Parameters:
        parent - The component that contains this component or null if this component has no parent.
        Effect:
        The drawable component is initialized with 0 for all parameters.
            this(0, 0, 0, 0)
